New Records: Mohamed Salah reached 100 caps for Egypt
Key Match Events: Trezeguet scored the first goal after 4 minutes
Trezeguet scored the second goal in the 29th minute
Mohamed Salah scored the third goal in the 56th minute
Mostafa Fathi scored the fourth goal in the 90th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Egypt had won their opening game against Cape Verde 3-0
Botswana lost their first game against Mauritania
Post-Match Reflections: Egypt now tops the group with six points from two games
The Pharaohs continue their campaign in October 2024 with home and away games against Mauritania
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hossam Hassan was forced to change his lineup due to injuries and absences of key players
Others: Egypt scored seven goals and did not concede any in the first two games of the qualifiers
